body:
Battle of Eternity II // Tournament 7

Official Map Pool


The map pool of Battle of Eternity II consists of seven Team Deathmatch maps, which are as follows:

Crossfire by {tag=606252f73dc24277853cc5df999e22fc} {tag=c29bef37d8e242a9b74604f2df78f374}


Plaza by {tag=107265d9d273459f957970394b30d91a} {tag=99522edd5edf40658861f7e280b7ff09}


Strike by {tag=54964b606ce749229a4c2b981d8c2ed7}


Arcadia by {tag=6409b5bbc55041a1808bdd8bbbd0e37a}


Injustice by {tag=7dcb1605a6414f6f99efea04278b6f7c}


Endurance by {tag=8de835a6916a4fcf9b25239dda454411}


Actrix by {tag=8242e55ecc6a458ab272a2b34918045f} {tag=1c74c43029a0471fb30bcc2d9031ebcb} {tag=d9b4ffbc11d0453aa93f82dc59fca4b6}
 

Map Veto Process:

Bo1

  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Remaining map is played.
Bo3
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Team A picks a map
  • Team B picks a map
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Remaining map is played (if necessary)

Notes:

  • Some maps may have errors, and will be fixed. Please report them to officials or map developers.
body_tagged:
Battle of Eternity II // Tournament 7

Official Map Pool


The map pool of Battle of Eternity II consists of seven Team Deathmatch maps, which are as follows:

Crossfire by  Eteh Legoche


Plaza by PokerFace Bloodoh


Strike by Spoookeh


Arcadia by Zedther


Injustice by lgmatias


Endurance by  Passively


Actrix by keenanjt Tazz gobernment
 

Map Veto Process:

Bo1

  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Remaining map is played.
Bo3
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Team A picks a map
  • Team B picks a map
  • Team A bans a map
  • Team B bans a map
  • Remaining map is played (if necessary)

Notes:

  • Some maps may have errors, and will be fixed. Please report them to officials or map developers.
title: BOE II: Official Map Pool+Veto Process

replies.body:
I hope this pool is subject to change, because it needs it

Crossfire is fine, plays well and is exciting.
Plaza if I remember will also be perfect for the 100 score limit, plays a little like facility.
Strike isn't the best map. I made it around a year ago with no idea how competitive maps were supposed to work and it generally just doesn't play well. Please remove it 
Arcadia's fine but spawns are way too quick, also prefer the smaller mid with the tiny staircases connecting the sides. 
Injustice plays great, requires actual stratting instead of running round like morons. 
Haven't played endurance yet but it seems really stale and bow spammy like that red and blue map from avicus league.
Actrix will play well.

So imo remove Strike and Endurance, and add Supply along with Xena TE from BOE1. They're both much more sword heavy and so will change they style of play through the different maps.
replies.body_tagged:
I hope this pool is subject to change, because it needs it

Crossfire is fine, plays well and is exciting.
Plaza if I remember will also be perfect for the 100 score limit, plays a little like facility.
Strike isn't the best map. I made it around a year ago with no idea how competitive maps were supposed to work and it generally just doesn't play well. Please remove it 
Arcadia's fine but spawns are way too quick, also prefer the smaller mid with the tiny staircases connecting the sides. 
Injustice plays great, requires actual stratting instead of running round like morons. 
Haven't played endurance yet but it seems really stale and bow spammy like that red and blue map from avicus league.
Actrix will play well.

So imo remove Strike and Endurance, and add Supply along with Xena TE from BOE1. They're both much more sword heavy and so will change they style of play through the different maps.

replies.body: Appreciate the feedback. to start, we don’t have access to Xena, so we can’t add that. We didn’t want to add Supply because of no scorebox, and we didn’t want to force it into the map. Second, personally I wanted to do a little Map testing to make the map pool 5, it’s perfect for a tdm tournament. Poker wants 7, so you’ll have to talk to him. I think endurance could possibly play well, it has a lot of room and side pathways to take.
replies.body_tagged: Appreciate the feedback. to start, we don’t have access to Xena, so we can’t add that. We didn’t want to add Supply because of no scorebox, and we didn’t want to force it into the map. Second, personally I wanted to do a little Map testing to make the map pool 5, it’s perfect for a tdm tournament. Poker wants 7, so you’ll have to talk to him. I think endurance could possibly play well, it has a lot of room and side pathways to take.

replies.body: I think  Supply would be fine even if it doesn't have scoreboxes every map doesn't need to be the same. It plays well and is a pretty liked map anyways so I think making changes in the first place would be unwise. (this is feedback)
